subject: Blockchain & Web3
title: Proof of Work vs Proof of Stake
description: Two ways to secure a blockchain in 60 seconds.

hook.text: How do thousands of strangers agree on who owns what, without trusting each other?

buildup.text: Proof of Work: computers race to solve puzzles. The winner adds the next block and earns rewards.

discovery.text: Problem: all that computing uses massive energy. Bitcoin uses more electricity than some countries.

twist.text: Proof of Stake: instead of puzzles, validators lock up coins as collateral. Cheat? Lose your stake.

climax.text: Ethereum switched to Proof of Stake in 2022, cutting energy use by 99.95%.

punchline.text: Work vs Stake: both secure billions, just with different tradeoffs.

quiz.question: Why did Ethereum switch to Proof of Stake?
options: To be controlled by fewer people
